name: 李老师不是你老师

A video that is currently going viral in China Video 1
The video shows a person in charge holding a meeting with epidemic prevention personnel
The person in charge said
You can get a reward of 3,500 yuan for bringing one person to the quarantine center
A lot of quarantine centers have been built and they need to be filled.
He also said that this disease is just a minor cold now

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Banqiao Village, Panyu District, Guangzhou City issued an initiative letter. The letter stated that it is predicted that the epidemic will continue for a long time in the future, and it is not ruled out that a large-scale regional epidemic will occur and cause a long-term lockdown. Therefore, it is proposed that factories, enterprises, and shops without orders should be closed in advance, and citizens should return home in an orderly manner.

The student who tested positive for COVID-19 at Beijing Foreign Studies University was deceived into going to the quarantine center. The teacher said it was a quarantine hotel.
Location: Beijing, Maquanying quarantine center
Controversy: The student found out that the place he went to was not the place he had agreed to go to, and wanted to leave.
Result: In the end, he still stayed in the quarantine center

Breaking news
Many districts in Guangzhou issued notices to optimize prevention and control measures and lift temporary control areas
On November 30, Haizhu District, Liwan District, Tianhe District, Panyu District, Conghua District, Baiyun District and other districts in Guangzhou successively issued notices to optimize and improve prevention and control measures and lift control measures in temporary control areas.

content: Recently, a video of an 18-year-old student in Lanzhou arguing with epidemic prevention personnel has been widely circulated online. It is reported that Lanzhou City has taken a large number of students from Yuzhong County under its jurisdiction to the lockdown. The temperature is more than ten degrees below zero and the lockdown environment is harsh.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Breaking news: Former Chinese Communist Party leader Jiang Zemin passes away

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a news release from Xinhua News Agency, Comrade Jiang Zemin suffered from leukemia and multiple organ failure. Rescue efforts were ineffective and he died in Shanghai at 12:13 on November 30, 2022 at the age of 96.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The June 4th Incident was mentioned in the "Letter to the Whole Party, the Whole Army and the People of All Ethnic Groups in the Country" released today.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师

Ordinary users can no longer post or comment on this matter

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I want to tell you that freedom of speech itself includes a variety of different voices. And there are radicals and moderates in any group. Everyone has their own opinions and can oppose different opinions. Don't generalize. Friends who have been following me in the past few days must know that from Foxconn to Xinjiang to major cities in China, there are various events caused by various demands. Please look at everything that is happening rationally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I support everyone to firmly oppose the views that they disagree with. Let your demands be more clear and explicit. But please also tolerate and understand me. No matter what happened at the scene, I cannot cover it up or report selectively. If you think that I have reported one-sidedly about an incident, please bring me other relevant evidence so that we can record the incident more completely.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today's update is temporarily suspended. I am dealing with some personal matters.
